dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.cbe.usage.spec.UsageSpecCharValueRelationship
dataStructure.description:
A aggregation, migration, substitution, dependency, or exclusivity relationship between/among UsageSpecCharacteristicValues.

This association class is optional
dataStructure.label: UsageSpecCharValueRelationship

child.name: charValueRelationshipType
child.description:
A categorization of the relationship between values, such as aggregation, migration, substitution, dependency, exclusivity.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: charValueRelationshipType

child.name: validFor
child.description:
The period for which the relationship is applicable.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: validFor
